attributes.action: Correct HMR&C Online Tax  registration procedures for non-UK residents so that it is actually possible to register.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Habitually, HMR&C use OHMS postage which is sent surface mail outside UK.  Most jurisdictions deliberately delay non - airmail franked letters for up to 28 days which is the expiry time for HMR&C online registration authorisation delivery by mail. No Government Department seems willing to put in place a registration process that is actually workable for non-residents.  This needs fixing in 2009.
